release.action: Enabled generation of a changes report.
Added AstComparer. Unlike the equals() method in AstNode this comparer can be configured to ignore attributes and locations.
Fixed bug in JXPath implementation: Attributes/Properties of a node were not discovered under certain circumstances.
Fixed race condition bug in VisitorBase.
Tests fail under Windows due to encoding and path separator differences.
Added fluent interface for creating simple test ASTs.
Deprecated Visitor class in favor of the classes VisitorBase and AstVisitor.
Location class can parse a string to a location object.
Removed the "dependencies" file since dependencies are now properly listed in the reports generated by maven.
Removed xstream and jaxb from dependency management.
Removed node types: AstNode.NT_CONTENT_NODE and AstNode.NT_STRING_CONTENT_NODE. ContentNode and StringContentNode don't implement getNodeType() any more.

release.description: Preparing for deployment to maven central
release.action: Enabled maven site generation, adding a site descriptor and some custom css.
Added profiles for quick builds and GPG signing.
Added jaxb plugin to plugin management.
Added <scm> section to prevent maven from deriving faulty scm information from the parent pom.
